title: Game Development Workshop
description:
# Game Development Workshop

**From Player to Creator: Build Your First Game!**

## Workshop Overview

This intensive hands-on workshop will guide you through the process of creating your very own 2D game from scratch. By the end of the session, you'll have a playable game to share with friends and add to your portfolio!

### What You'll Learn

#### Game Design Fundamentals
* Core game mechanics
* Level design principles
* Player psychology
* Balancing challenge and reward

#### Technical Implementation
* Setting up Unity Engine
* C# programming basics for games
* Sprite animation
* Collision detection
* Audio implementation

#### Publishing Your Game
* Building for different platforms
* Game testing strategies
* Distribution options

## Workshop Leaders

### Jason Lee
*Lead Game Developer at Steamroller Studios*

Jason has shipped over 10 titles for PC and mobile platforms, including the award-winning indie hit "Pixel Odyssey."

### Mei Ling
*Game Design Instructor at DigiPen Institute*

Mei specializes in game mechanics and player engagement, with experience working on AAA titles at Ubisoft.

## Prerequisites

* Basic programming knowledge helpful but not required
* Bring your own laptop (Windows/Mac)
* Pre-install Unity (free version) - instructions will be emailed

*Space is limited to ensure personalized instruction.*
